channel.title: Easyrsc Color Changes
channel.description:
I was able to change the color of the boots in my inventory, I want to know how to change the looks of them from another players perspective, and also i changed the sprite of a item to 189 which is party hat and it worked fine but a bunch of other items fudged up why?.
Doesn't show me wielding the edited party hat either.
